Select the plugin to activate for concre: Select the plugin to activate for concretely sending emails
Force all mails to be sent by this Sende: Force all mails to be sent by this Sender email, instead of users adresses
String automatically added at the beginn: String automatically added at the beginning of the mail subject
String automatically added at the end of: String automatically added at the end of the mail subject
Main Layout for the email body, use HTML: Main Layout for the email body, use HTML for send nice emails, and use the PYDIO_MAIL_BODY keyword for the real content.
Extract the main layout from a localized: Extract the main layout from a localized file. Will prevail on the previous parameter, make sure to have an PYDIO_MAIL_BODY in the layout file.
You can add many email separated by comm: You can add many email separated by commas
Choose your mail frequency (like 9:00 or: Choose your mail frequency (like 9:00 or 9:00,14:00 or Wednesday)
Twice a day (every day at and): Twice a day (every day at and)
Store emails in a queue and batch-proces: Store emails in a queue and batch-process them. Users can choose the sending frequency. Make sure to set up a CRON on consume_mail_queue action if you use this option.
